title: 820-2523-b no pm_slp_s4 present, all s5 power rails present
message:
820-2523-B NO PM_SLP_S4 PRESENT, ALL S5 POWER RAILS PRESENT
IDK WHAT TO DO FROM HERE,

green light (yes)
charges battery idk
i also believe that vr pwrgd delay was 0v as well
idk what im missing/where to go from here. i tried finding a short but no luck
*bought from ebay to practice on, previous owner changed bios chip and knocked off a few resistors, i replaced the bios chip (preprogrammed off internet) and resistors (donor board)
and i also had to replace r6905 on ppcdin,
any ideas on where to go from here.
i saw pm_slp_s4_l comes from the mcp, i believe i tested the s5 rails coming into that chip ( i only saw 2) and they were present. [TABLE="border: 0, cellpadding: 0, cellspacing: 0"]

title: 820-2523-b no pm_slp_s4 present, all s5 power rails present
message: Use power pads to power on the board and see if fan spins..

title: 820-2523-b no pm_slp_s4 present, all s5 power rails present
message: power pads? sorry im fairly  new to this, what do you mean by that please

title: 820-2523-b no pm_slp_s4 present, all s5 power rails present
message: Search R5015 on boardview and short both pads/pins....

title: 820-2523-b no pm_slp_s4 present, all s5 power rails present
message: ok thank you

title: 820-2523-b no pm_slp_s4 present, all s5 power rails present
message: nothing happens. so i can short smc_onoff_l on any board and its the same as pressing the power button.

title: 820-2523-b no pm_slp_s4 present, all s5 power rails present
message: A common issue with this boards is C7771, check voltage on L7770 should be 1V......

title: 820-2523-b no pm_slp_s4 present, all s5 power rails present
message: both sides of l7771 were 1.05v

title: 820-2523-b no pm_slp_s4 present, all s5 power rails present
message: d6905 (which is the component directly after r6905 that i had to replace) , pin #2 says "nc 2727" which i thought nc meant not controlled, yet its putting off 10v,  does that mean anything?

title: 820-2523-b no pm_slp_s4 present, all s5 power rails present
message:
1st, don't buy Ebay garbage.
What is resistance to GND on 3V42 rail?

title: 820-2523-b no pm_slp_s4 present, all s5 power rails present
message:
im buying them from ebay so i have something to practice on before coming to your guys' training soon.  
resistance to ground on 3v42 is.....(measured on c5725, diode mode .636, 20.94 kohm measured as well)

title: 820-2523-b no pm_slp_s4 present, all s5 power rails present
message: You have to have pm_slp_s4 for this machine to turn on. this is not a fun one to work on. when i see these i first check all the power rails from the beginning to make sure i didn't mis something. if all is good, then i check the area around the smc, also checking for sort to ground on pm_slp_s4, las one i did had some crap under the smc i had to reflow the smc.

title: 820-2523-b no pm_slp_s4 present, all s5 power rails present
message: ok thank you

title: 820-2523-b no pm_slp_s4 present, all s5 power rails present
message: You are using an ORIGINAL 85W charger? No chinese garbage or anything below 85W will power this board!

title: 820-2523-b no pm_slp_s4 present, all s5 power rails present
message: You should also spend a solid 10 minutes looking over the board and making SURE there are no missing components, or any small caps/resistors that have been knocked off the board. If you got this from eBay, it's probably been tossed around in its life...might have some missing bits.

title: 820-2523-b no pm_slp_s4 present, all s5 power rails present
message:
the charger is original, and i did inspect the board for missing components, everytime i saw a spot that looked like it might need something it was an omit or no stuff spot. 
ill check the smc and the area around it, and check slp s4 for a short, thanks

title: 820-2523-b no pm_slp_s4 present, all s5 power rails present
message: Is it 85W?

title: 820-2523-b no pm_slp_s4 present, all s5 power rails present
message: 60w is the highest im finding in my store, ill buy an original 85w and see if that helps.

title: 820-2523-b no pm_slp_s4 present, all s5 power rails present
message: using 85w doesnt make a difference, i just bought an original 85w and used it, measurements are the same, still no power
